title: League of Legends.exe - Application Error
body:
The application was unable to start correctly (0xc0000005). Click OK to close the application.

I get this error every time a game tries to load. I have tried everything under the sun to get it to work, including the Hextech Repair Tool. Am I really not going to be able to play URF?!?! I haven't been able to play League for the past few months and this is how it goes now that I'm back? This started last night. Prior to that I had no issues and was able to play just fine. Nothing else has changed.

replies.body: Did you fix it? I´m having the same problem and all I see rioters say is: It´s your anti-virus...

Something might be blocking the game from launching properly.  This could be some OS security setting or anti-virus protection that's not allowing the game to open up.  Go over the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help with this.  Let me know if you have any questions!
That is what fixed it for me. My avast anti virus had just updated and when iuninstalled the software my games started loading thank you

Okay, so my issue has been resolved. After some diagnostics I was able to narrow down the issue to a service called "Razer Game Scanner". It's associated with Razer Synapse. I'm going to be contacting Razer support to find a resolution to the issue. Currently the best solution was to disable the service in MSConfig. Will post an update when I have spoken with Razer about the issue.
Same things happening to me. Just started today. Never had issues before.

Well, I guess I will hold off on trying to join any games until this issue is resolved. I don't want to keep having a negative impact on the games I'm trying to join. It's quite unfortunate as I've been away from the game for quite a few months and was looking forward to being able to play again. This is quite frustrating and just want to have it resolved.

I'm in the exact same boat. I just reinstalled windows because of this error... thinking it was something on my end. I'm still having the same issue, even after doing everything in all the guides.

Getting tagged as a "leaver" because I can't load the game... missing out on URF weekend too... so frustrating.

same here, I tried to duo with a friend and couldnt load in, we won, but because of the issue i lost 15 LP.

as soon as the game was over the client new and put me into the after game lobby like i had been present all along. I had restarted the client many times each time giving me the app error

then tried an urf to see if it was just ranked and same issue.

EDIT - the URF game just finished and because i couldnt connect i have been flagged for afk behaviours and am eligible to earn loot. I hope this gets sorted because not only am i losing out on playing the game i am also being penalised for something that is clearly game related.
